int initializes_controller_stat ( CONTROLLER_STAT_T *  controller_stat,
char *  path_name 
)

Initializes a statistical control controller and access the shared statistical control memory segment.

Parameters:
controller_statwith the reference to the statistical control controller to initialize
path_namepath name for the System V IPC key
Returns:
integer 0 if the controller was successfully initialized, the error code otherwise
Author:
Cláudio Esperança <cesperanc@gmail.com>, Diogo Serra <2081008@student.estg.ipleiria.pt>
